scripts.build: cd packages/core && tsc && vite build && copy package.json dist && copy README.md dist
scripts.db:generate: cd apps/hub && pnpm run drizzle-kit generate
scripts.lint: eslint . --ext .js,.ts,.vue && cd apps/carbon && pnpm lint && cd ../hub && pnpm lint
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --ext .js,.ts,.vue --fix && cd apps/carbon && pnpm lint --fix && cd ../hub && pnpm lint --fix
